title: A Seven-month-long Honeymoon
description: Courtney's and Patrick's postnuptial adventures in Asia, South America, and around the US of A.

title: Axolotl by Julio Cortázar
description: Spanish-to-English translation of Axolotl, short story by Julio Cortázar (1956).

title: Genjo Koan by Dogen
description: Japanese-to-English translation of Dogen's Genjo Koan (1233).

title: What am I up to in 2023?
description: This year I'm getting married, learning to code, working on a language learning app, and traveling to Europe and Asia.

title: On Relearning to Code as an Adult
description: A first-person report from a 30-something (re)learning to code after years of false starts. Plus some of the things that helped me along the way.

title: Haiku by Basho
description: Japanese-to-English translations of a handful of haiku by Matsuo Basho (1644-1694).

title: A.I. Assistive Intuition
description: Some measured but sweeping generalizations on AI from a non-expert who's been having fun with some tools.

title: Second Thoughts
description: Patrick's second blog post, in which he revisits his first blog post and has some second thoughts.

title: First Thoughts
description: Patrick's first blog post, in which he decides to write a blog.
